root.Summary: 1: Yu Y, Qiu P, Zhu Y, Li J, Wu M, Zhang B, Yao K. A novel phenotype-genotypecorrelation with an Arg555Trp mutation of TGFBI gene in Thiel-Behnke cornealdystrophy in a Chinese pedigree. BMC Ophthalmol. 2015 Oct 13;15:131. doi:10.1186/s12886-015-0121-0. PubMed PMID: 26464103; PubMed Central PMCID:PMC4605025.
